input: The railings that I put on were much needed on the porches, because the _ were safer.
I've been using containers instead of my garden to grow vegetables because the moles get into the _ more easily.
Jeremy tried to use willpower to control his diet and stay off social media, but he found the _ easier to stick to.
The professional basketball game was entertaining to Neil but not Lawrence because _ loved sports.
The cereal was full of nutrition, but the breakfast bar was unhealthy, because the _ was full of sugar.
Joseph likes to prepare ahead of time and Craig does not which is why _ is rarely ready for meetings.
The family enjoyed playing lengthy and shorter games, that night they played the _ game because the time was limited.
Maria dressed Elena's large chest wound with gauze and antibacterial ointment because _ was in pain from the wound.
Laura was quick to compliment their employees for a job well done but Megan was not. _ was well respected by everyone in the company.
Joel avoided the thrift store, although Matthew loved it a lot, because _ adored vintage clothes.
What you drink affects your health; for example, drinking a soda is worse for you than a bottle of water because the _ is natural.
Kyle tried to stop before Nelson was hit because it was _ that was the passenger.
The man tried to put the bag inside the cabinet but the _ was too large.
Steven thought twice before expressing his discomfort aloud, Michael seemed so happy, _ didn't want to spoil that.
Joel had to prepare a fancy dinner for Robert, because _ had hired them as a chef.
Jessica made Sarah do their bidding and bend to their will, because _ lacked the position of control in the situation.
